examples.example: 通过不断地学习和努力，我的能力得到了很大的提高。

translate.english: Through continuous learning and efforts, my ability has been greatly improved.

examples.example: 我们应该努力学习，逐步提高自己的综合素质。

translate.english: We should study hard and gradually improve our comprehensive quality.

examples.example: 我们要不断提高自己的素养，以更好地面对生活中的各种挑战。

translate.english: We should continuously improve our quality to better face various challenges in life.
